content: in the next st around join w/ slip_stitch 21 single_crochet rnds 24-25 chain 1 single_crochet in ea st around join w/ slip_stitch round 26 chain 1 single_crochet in next 5 sts single_crochet single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 2 single_crochet finish off flippers make 4 row 1 leaving a 6 tail chain 4 working in the back ridge single_crochet in the 2nd chain from hook and in each chain across 3sc row 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each single_crochet across row 3 chain 1 turn 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in the next st 2 single_crochet in the last st 5sc row 4 chain 1 turn single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet decrease 3sc row 5 chain 1 turn single_crochet decrease single_crochet in last st 2sc row 6 chain 1 turn
